title: Malena
synopsis: Twelve-year-old Renato is enamored with Malèna. But when jealous townsfolk begin spreading rumors about her, Renato must separate fact from fiction.

title: Gomorrah
synopsis: The intertwining tales of a delivery boy, a tailor, a businessman and two teenagers form the fabric of this gritty examination of the Neapolitan mob.

title: Perfetti sconosciuti
synopsis: A dinner party unravels when a group of friends agrees to leave their phones on the table, airing the contents of their correspondences -- and secrets.

title: Suburra
synopsis: A grueling battle over turning a seaside town near Rome into a gambling paradise exposes criminal rivalries and endemic corruption on a grand scale.
countries: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: We Have a Pope
synopsis: The pope has died, and the College of Cardinals has chosen his successor. But what happens if the newly elected pontiff doesnt want the job?

title: Human Capital
synopsis: In the wake of the economic meltdown, the fate of two families are bound together by their childrens romance and a mysterious hit-and-run accident.

title: They Call Me Jeeg
synopsis: An ex-cons world is transformed by his newfound superpowers. Criminals want him for his muscle, but a beautiful fan just wants him to do some good.

title: Quo Vado?
synopsis: Determined to hold onto his plush government job, Checco accepts a transfer from his home in Italy to the North Pole.

title: Benvenuti al sud
synopsis: A postal manager from Northern Italy who dreams of working in Milan fears for his safety when hes transferred to a small village near Naples.

title: La mafia uccide solo destate
synopsis: Between the 1970s and 1980s, as the Mafia terrorizes his homeland with bombs and killings, young, love-struck Sicilian Arturo grows to manhood.

title: A.C.A.B.: All Cops Are Bastards
synopsis: The day-to-day stories of the controversial Italian riot police are told through the eyes of three unpopular officers who confront violence daily.

title: I Can Quit Whenever I Want
synopsis: When a laid-off university biologist cant make a living, he enlists colleagues in the same boat to join him in more lucrative work: drug dealing.

title: Non ho sonno
synopsis: An insomnia-ridden cop is drawn out of retirement when a closed serial killer case from 1983 is reopened 17 years later after a series of new murders.

title: Me and You
synopsis: Bernardo Bertolucci helms this tale about a 14-year-old boy who dreams of  being left alone with his stack of horror novels.

title: Fire at Sea
synopsis: Heartbreak, hope and nostalgia collide in this complex portrait of Lampedusa, a Mediterranean island where thousands of migrants land each year.

title: Sole a Catinelle
synopsis: After finding himself suddenly jobless and deep in debt, salesman Luca aims to bond with his 9-year-old son on a nice but cheap summer holiday.

title: Scusa ma ti chiamo amore
synopsis: An unhappy 37-year-old ad executive and a cheerful high school senior defy the odds when they fall in love and try to make the relationship work.

title: The First Beautiful Thing
synopsis: An embittered teacher grudgingly returns to his hometown to see his estranged, terminally ill mother and begins to come to terms with his past.

title: Viva la liberta
synopsis: When a disgraced politician disappears, his bipolar twin takes his place, energizing both the electorate and party members with his fresh ideas.

title: The Wonders
synopsis: As an Italian beekeeping family’s way of life starts to fade, a reality show may be the only thing to save it and their bright adolescent daughter.

title: Che bella giornata
synopsis: A security guard at the magnificent Milan Cathedral falls for a woman with a secret plan to blow up the church.

title: Notte prima degli esami
synopsis: With final exams looming, Luca scrambles to get into the good graces of a loathed professor while trying to learn the identity of a mysterious girl.

title: All Ladies Do It
synopsis: Diana and Paolo are married ... but not monogamous, an arrangement that works fine until one of Dianas lovers becomes obsessed with her.

title: Cado dalle Nubi
synopsis: An aspiring singer from southern Italy whos just been dumped moves north to Milan, where he falls in love and enters a TV singing competition show.

title: The Solitude of Prime Numbers
synopsis: This drama from director Saverio Costanzo follows the troubled lives of Mattia and Alice, erstwhile friends devastated by childhood traumas: she a serious skiing accident, he an event that harmed his mentally challenged sister.

title: Benvenuti al nord
synopsis: Mattia feels like a fish out of water when hes transferred to work in Milan, where a newly promoted Alberto has a crisis on his hands.

title: The Immature
synopsis: Twenty years after graduating from high school, a group of old friends reconnect when the Ministry of Education orders them to retake an exam.

title: Tutta colpa di Freud
synopsis: A psychoanalyst faces a professional impasse, as he struggles with three difficult cases that happen to involve his own grown daughters.

title: The Invisible Boy
synopsis: Ruthlessly humiliated by bullies at school, a teen wishes he had the power to become invisible -- and soon discovers that he can do just that.

title: Bianca
synopsis: An eccentric math professor who fills his life with peculiar obsessions is suspected of a neighbors murder while romancing an attractive colleague.

title: God Willing
synopsis: Shocked to learn his son is leaving medicine to become a priest, atheist heart surgeon Tomasso sets out to undermine his sons charismatic mentor.

title: Slam
synopsis: Teen father-to-be Sam imagines his future as a young parent and finds a surprising mentor while reading about his idol, pro skateboarder Tony Hawk.

title: Italiano medio
synopsis: An anti-conformist, tree-loving idealist takes a pill to think like everyone else, only to discover that he hasnt been himself all along.

title: Qualunquemente
synopsis: A slimy, boorish lowlife who cavorts with prostitutes returns to his Calabrian hometown and runs for office, despite his lack of public-spiritedness.

title: Il giovane favoloso
synopsis: While battling poor health, Italian poet and philosopher Giacomo Leopardi finds the strength to lead an extraordinary life.

title: Escort in Love
synopsis: When a wealthy woman is suddenly widowed and left penniless, she tries to hold on to her son by turning to the oldest profession in the world.

title: Neverlake
synopsis: A teen visiting her estranged father in Italy stumbles upon the Neverlake, an ancient body of water said to be guarded by the spirits of the dead.

title: Benvenuto Presidente!
synopsis: When frustrated politicians name a historical figure as the next president, an honest, humble man by the same name suddenly becomes Italys leader.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: A Quiet Life
synopsis: An Italian chef running a hotel in the German countryside finds his tranquil family life threatened by two men connected to his violent past.

title: Ex
synopsis: Six couples -- all on the outs -- find their paths intersecting while discovering that each of their exes has a lingering effect on their lives.

title: Notte prima degli esami - Oggi
synopsis: In 2006, as World Cup fever sweeps Italy, teen Luca falls hard for dolphin trainer Azzurra and stumbles on a family secret -- right before his exams.

title: Men vs. Women
synopsis: From married couples to platonic roommates to testy rivals with romantic chemistry, the never-ending battle of the sexes gets personal.

title: Basilicata Coast to Coast
synopsis: Four band members with personal issues walk 100 kilometers to a music festival as a publicity stunt, but the gimmick proves to be much more than that.

title: Piazza Fontana: The Italian Conspiracy
synopsis: On December 12, 1969, a huge bomb planted in a bank in Milan killed 17 people, a shocking crime that the Italian police first blamed on anarchists.

title: Happy Family
synopsis: To show how fear rules most peoples lives, a writer crafts a tale of star-crossed lovers who want to marry, despite their obvious differences.

title: A Five Star Life
synopsis: A single 40-something woman with a jet-setting dream job questions her solitary life and wonders whether romance might be her ticket to happiness.

title: Rosso come il cielo
synopsis: Sent to a school for the blind, 10-year-old Mirco resists traditional methods of learning and expresses himself by creating sound collages.

title: Ultimate Beastmaster Italy
synopsis: Competitors representing Italy and five other countries battle it out on a grueling obstacle course. Bianca Balti and Francesco Facchinetti host.

title: Do You See Me?
synopsis: Upon returning to Italy, a successful, overeducated architect faces limited job prospects as a woman and conjures up an elaborate scheme to get hired.

title: The Rich, the Pauper and the Butler
synopsis: A business titan, his butler and a down-on-his-luck stranger find their fates entertwined amid a sudden economic downturn.

title: Il principe abusivo
synopsis: Needing good PR, a snooty princess orchestrates a brief romance with an ordinary guy. But the schlub she picks proves more resourceful than expected.

title: Immaturi - Il viaggio
synopsis: After passing their final exam, the friends travel to Paros, Greece, for a vacation filled with temptations, betrayals and high jinks.

title: Across the River
synopsis: Rising river waters trap a wildlife biologist in a remote, abandoned village, where he soon discovers -- to his horror -- that hes not alone.

title: N (Io e Napoleone)
synopsis: An idealistic young school teacher determined to assassinate Napoleon finds himself drawn to the exiled French general after becoming his confidant.

title: Lucky and Zorba
synopsis: Dying after an oil spill accident, a seagull entrusts her egg to Zorba the cat, who promises to protect it and later teach the newborn how to fly.

title: A Ciambra
synopsis: A 14-year-old from southern Italy must grow up quickly in order to protect his family after his father and older brother are arrested.

title: I soliti idioti
synopsis: Overbearing father Ruggero takes his sensitive son Gianluca on a crazy road trip so he can experience real life. Based on the beloved comedy series.

title: Gladiatori di Roma
synopsis: Timo, a student at a gladiator academy in Rome, has no desire to enter the arena -- until he decides to impress the mesmerizing Lucilla.

title: Bianca come il latte, rossa come il sangue
synopsis: An angst-ridden teen who cant seem to find joy in anything faces a new outlook on life when he meets a pretty girl with a serious illness.

title: Fuga di cervelli
synopsis: When Emilio learns that his longtime crush is going to the University of Oxford, he and his pals devise a plan to fake their way into the school.

title: The Jewel
synopsis: This taut drama based on a true story follows the rise and fall of a food magnate whose success has been fueled by fraud and corruption.

title: Come tu mi vuoi
synopsis: When brainy, ugly-duckling student Giada tutors rich, frivolous Riccardo, she succumbs to his charms and sets out to transform herself into a swan.

title: Tutto tutto niente niente
synopsis: A sleazy politician, a racist secessionist and a drug addict are released from prison to become members of Italys Parliament.

title: La matassa
synopsis: After inheriting a family feud, a pair of cousins finally reconciles just in time to get wrapped up in a messy plot involving Russian mobsters.

title: Ever Been to the Moon?
synopsis: A fashion journalist decides to sell her farm in the Italian countryside, where she meets a handsome farmer and finds out what shes been missing.

title: Love Is Eternal While It Lasts
synopsis: After his wife gives him the boot, a middle-aged man tries his hand at dating but discovers that he really connects with his friends girlfriend.

title: Si Accettano Miracoli
synopsis: When hes let go from his HR job in the city, a man returns home and sees a leaky pipe in his brothers church as the way to save the crumbling town.

title: Andiamo a quel paese
synopsis: Hit hard by the economy, best friends Salvo and Valentino decide to move back to their quiet home town, but things dont go as smoothly as they hoped.

title: Ogni maledetto Natale
synopsis: Sparks fly between two young lovers ... until Christmas meals with their dysfunctional, diametrically opposed families put their love to the test.

title: Ma che bella sorpresa
synopsis: After his wife leaves him, a hopeless romantic digs his way out of devastation with the help of a loyal friend and an alluring new neighbor.

title: The Big Dream
synopsis: Amidst the turmoil of the 1960s, a romantic triad develops between idealistic college student Laura, political radical Libero and aspiring actor Nicola, but their love and passions are put to the test when ones secret threatens to break their bond.

title: The Worst Christmas of My Life
synopsis: Mayhem ensues when expectant parents Paolo and Margherita get together with friends and family to celebrate Christmas in a castle in northern Italy.

title: Questione di cuore
synopsis: After suffering heart attacks on the same night, a writer and a mechanic meet in the hospital and strike up an unlikely, life-changing friendship.

title: Latin Lover
synopsis: The daughters and widows of a legendary film idol and Lothario gather to honor his career in this riotous tribute to the golden age of Italian cinema.

title: The Perfect Life
synopsis: An Italian doctor seeks a new life in Kenya, only to be reunited with an old friend from back home -- as well as his wife, with whom he has a past.

title: Confusi e felici
synopsis: When a sudden health problem plunges psychoanalyst Marcello into a depression, his colorful clients scramble to pull him out of his funk.

title: Aspirante Vedovo
synopsis: After reports of his very rich wifes demise prove false, the unhappily married Alberto, a failed entrepreneur, begins to plot her death for real.

title: It May Be Love But It Doesnt Show
synopsis: Best friends Salvo and Valentino find themselves in a romantic comedy of errors while running a tourism business in their new home town of Turin.

title: Fiore
synopsis: Serving time in different parts of the same Italian prison, teens Daphne and Josh fall in love despite rarely being able to see or talk to each other.

title: Finalmente la felicità
synopsis: A career-stifled music teacher who dreams of opening his own school learns his late mother had adopted a Brazilian girl, whos now a beautiful model.

title: First Team: Juventus
synopsis: Follow renowned soccer club Juventus on and off the pitch as they attempt to win a seventh straight Italian title and achieve Champions League glory.

title: Perez.
synopsis: After making one too many enemies as a high-flying lawyer, a public defender makes a deal with the devil when his daughter falls for a mob bosss son.

title: Stai Lontana Da Me
synopsis: Typically unlucky in his own love life, an experienced marriage counselor meets a special woman. But his constant misfortune may plague them both.

title: Soap Opera
synopsis: As snow falls on New Years Eve, a buildings eccentric residents deal with breakups, betryals, infatuation, death and -- of course -- love.

title: Lintrepido
synopsis: Middle-aged Antonio has lived his life as a jack-of-all-trades, but has nothing to show for it now that his wife has left him to raise their son.

title: Pazze di me
synopsis: A man in love pretends to be an orphan to prevent the seven strong-willed women in his family from ruining his new relationship.

title: Belli di papà
synopsis: Disappointed in his spoiled children, wealthy businessman Vincenzo fakes bankruptcy to force his kids to learn what it means to work for a living.

title: 2 Soliti Idioti
synopsis: Bridegroom Gianluca and his dad go on the lam to evade a crazy Russian mobster seeking revenge against Gianluca for accidentally killing his mother.

title: People Who Are Well
synopsis: When his boss lets him go, a cynical lawyer whos sure he lives a charmed life is shocked and refuses to accept the situation, no matter the cost.

title: Camera Café
synopsis: A fixed camera inside an office coffee machine logs the antics of salesman Paolo, union leader Luca and their zany colleagues during coffee breaks.

title: Il professor Cenerentolo
synopsis: While serving time for a botched bank heist, a man puts on an elaborate charade to conceal his identity from a woman he encounters at the prison.

title: Ex – Amici come prima!
synopsis: Different couples trying to maneuver through rough patches in their respective relationships intersect with one another, as fate brings them together.

title: Unique Brothers
synopsis: Two brothers -- one mature and driven, the other a man-child who refuses to grow up -- are forced by a twist of fate to switch roles with each other.

title: Tiramisù
synopsis: Through dumb luck, a frustrated medical salesman winds up at the top of the social and professional ladder. Maintaining his new status won’t be easy.

title: Matrimonio alle Bahamas
synopsis: Two families arrive for the destination wedding of their children, but differences in money, class and outlook make for a volatile mix.

title: 2061: Un anno eccezionale
synopsis: As an energy crisis divides Italy into feuding regions, a ragtag group of fighters treks across the barren land on a mission to remake their nation.

title: A Fairy Tale Wedding
synopsis: Twenty years after high school, a man invites his less successful pals to his resort wedding, where some old high jinks could help them all grow up.

title: Italy: Love It, or Leave It
synopsis: Two award-winning gay filmmakers embark on a road trip across Italy, pondering whether to leave the increasingly intolerant nation behind.

title: Tutto molto bello
synopsis: A quick bite to eat turns into an epically comic odyssey for two expectant fathers, one stuffy and cautious and the other as carefree as can be.

title: The Youngest Son
synopsis: Business baron Luciano abandoned his wife and two young sons. But with his businesses failing, he thinks long-forgotten son may be his safety net.

title: La pecora nera
synopsis: After decades of shock therapy and pills, a quirky inmate wrongfully committed to a psychiatric hospital can no longer discern reality from fantasy.

title: Un fidanzato per mia moglie
synopsis: A deeply frustrated husband who is unable to ask his annoying wife for a separation hires a famous playboy to seduce her.

title: La fidanzata di papà
synopsis: Love gets complicated when an Italian widower arrives in Miami for his grandsons birth and meets the babys grandmother, whos hiding a big secret.

title: Antimafia Squad
synopsis: A war rages between Mafia families in Palermo after the arrest of the last godfather. Two women face off: Claudia Mares and Rose Abate.

title: Forever Young
synopsis: A lawyer wont get off the fast track. A beautician pursues a much younger man. Comedy ensues as these middle-aged friends refuse to act their age.

title: Love Dream
synopsis: Unable to cope with his brothers death, a rock star retires to a desert island. There, he finds a beautiful genie who strives to inspire him.

title: Baciato dalla fortuna
synopsis: A debt-ridden cop thinks his prayers have been answered when he finally wins the lottery -- but he may not be the winner he thinks he is.

title: Unestate ai Caraibi
synopsis: As fun-seeking tourists converge on the beautiful Caribbean island of Antigua, several interconnected stories merge into one.

title: Vacanze ai Caraibi
synopsis: While on holiday in the Caribbean, a bankrupt family pins their hopes on a rich man, two strangers fall in lust, and a technophile gets shipwrecked.

title: Buona giornata
synopsis: From a tech-addicted businesswoman to a politician facing arrest, this film covers a day in the life of seven different people in Italy.

title: Outing - Fidanzati per sbaglio
synopsis: An aspiring fashion designer and his slacker friend try to pass themselves off as lovers to score a lucrative government grant.

title: Sapore di te
synopsis: College friends, lifeguards and an eclectic group of families flock to the Tuscan coast for wild and steamy adventures over two summers in the 1980s.

title: Iago
synopsis: Othello, Shakespeares timeless tale of love and revenge, is reimagined within the world of modern-day architecture students.

title: Matrimonio a Parigi
synopsis: A shyster businessman and an upright finance officer find their lives hopelessly entangled when they travel to Paris for their childrens graduation.

title: Faccio un salto allAvana
synopsis: An unhappily married man travels to Cuba, where he reaffirms that the rumors of his brothers death were greatly exaggerated.

title: La Mia Vita A Stelle E Strisce
synopsis: The country life of a Tuscan peasant unravels when his aunt returns from the U.S. with her family and begins to impose American habits.

title: La vita è una cosa meravigliosa
synopsis: A cop listening to wiretaps finds out too much about the crazy and confusing lives of his targets while also uncovering the truth about his fiancée.

title: Questo piccolo grande amore
synopsis: In the turbulent ’70s, two young students meet at a demonstration and fall passionately in love. Featuring the lovelorn music of Claudio Baglioni.

title: Universitari - Molto più che amici
synopsis: Three boys find their bro-centric vibe disrupted when three girls suddenly move in with them, but soon they start bonding like a family.

title: Le leggi del desiderio
synopsis: A popular life coach claims to hold the key to success. To prove it, he agrees to help three people realize their dreams in six months.

title: Se sei così ti dico sì
synopsis: After fading into obscurity, the a one-hit wonder gets another chance to return to his musical roots and make a huge splash once again.

title: Matrimonio al Sud
synopsis: A Milanese businessman is beside himself when his son decides to marry the daughter of a pizza chef from -- of all places -- Naples!

title: La Coppia dei Campioni
synopsis: After winning a shared trip to a soccer match, two colleagues who hold opposite world views find theyre stuck traveling together for the duration.

title: Sbirri
synopsis: A TV journalist whos lost his son to an overdose teams up with the anti-drug police squad in Milan, filming them as they work to catch drug dealers.

title: Si può fare lamore vestiti?
synopsis: While in her small hometown to care for her ailing mother, a sexologist befriends a young man struggling with his sexual identity.

title: My Tomorrow
synopsis: Stuck in an unsatisfying job and a dead-end affair with her married boss, a 40-something businesswoman searches for new fulfillment in her life.

title: Una donna per la vita
synopsis: After a car accident, a frustrated everyman leaves his disorganized girlfriend for his icily fetching chiropractor -- but fate reshuffles its cards.

title: Sexocracy: The man of Bunga Bunga
synopsis: Spotlighting talent agent Lele Moras role in the Silvio Berlusconi scandal, two filmmakers examine the tangle of sex, politics and show biz in Italy.

title: La pazza della porta accanto: Conversazione con Alda Merini
synopsis: In frank conversations, distinguished poet Alda Merini holds forth about religion, love, psychiatric hospitals and the power of poetry.

title: Quellestate
synopsis: Personal upheaval makes a family trip to Tuscany bittersweet for a 15-year-old boy, his sister and his parents in the summer of 1981.

title: Coffee for All
synopsis: In Naples, Buenos Aires and New York, people reflect on the Neapolitan tradition of suspended coffee and how it changed their lives.

title: Suburra: Blood on Rome
synopsis: In 2008, a fight over land in a seaside town near Rome spirals into a deadly battle between organized crime, corrupt politicians and the Vatican.

title: Influx
synopsis: Italians in London reveal the ups and downs of immigration and touch upon their uneasiness about leaving behind their crisis-ridden homeland.

title: Because of Darwin
synopsis: This series explores the groundbreaking work of biologist and naturalist Charles Darwin and its lasting impact on todays scientific frontiers.

title: One Day More
synopsis: A playboy becomes so smitten with a beauty he sees on the train every day that he follows her across the ocean when she moves.

title: Numero Zero. The Roots of Italian Rap
synopsis: In the 90s, the explosive popularity of hip-hop music in Italy impacts the nations character while creating a new kind of renegade artist.

title: The Country Cowboy
synopsis: A bored farmer moves to Milan in hopes of more excitement. But life and love in the big city may prove too much for a man this honest.

title: Roberto Saviano: Writing Under Police Protection
synopsis: Italian TV host Pif revisits Roberto Saviano, whos been living under protection since publishing Gomorrah, his exposé on organized crime in Naples.

title: Mancini: The Motorcycle Wizard
synopsis: Relive legendary coach and mechanic Guido Mancinis personal history of motorcycle racing as he speaks with the champion riders he taught as children.

title: Our Life
synopsis: A happy family man living outside Rome is suddenly devastated by personal tragedy -- as well as his own financial misadventures.

title: The Golden Age
synopsis: Inspired by the life of filmmaker Annabella Miscuglio, this intimate story explores one man’s quest to better comprehend his mothers creative legacy.

title: Comè bello far lamore
synopsis: A middle-aged couple rekindle their interest in sex when an old friend who became a Hollywood porn star gives them tips on spicing things up.

title: Weddings and Other Diasters
synopsis: Having completely given up on romance after her last beau joined the priesthood, a single woman reluctantly agrees to plan her sisters wedding.

title: Grillo vs Grillo
synopsis: Outspoken comedian Beppe Grillo reminisces about his long career, including the triumphs and controversies that fueled his rise in Italian politics.

title: Forgive Us Our Debts
synopsis: Threatened by creditors, a newly unemployed man agrees to work for a debt collector, but soon discovers his deal with the devil has unexpected costs.

title: Una Mamma Imperfetta
synopsis: Chiara shares what its like to juggle two kids, a husband and a demanding job via video diaries and cathartic chats with her friends.
